title: Sound On: Putin's Next Move, Pain at the Pump
itunes:title: Sound On: Putin's Next Move, Pain at the Pump
description:
Guests: Retired Brigadier General Mark Kimmitt, Jason McMann, Head of Geopolitical Risk Analysis at Morning Consult, Bloomberg Markets Correspondent Kriti Gupta, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
